data.title: Do drop in you'll be glad you did
data.text: Drove by this place over 100 times finally we stopped in for dinner and it was wonderful, live music, great fresh food, good times with great folks that work there, friendly staff and owner, Pizza & wings awesome very relaxing place to dine with a glass of wine- check in out you'll be glad you did-Salute-

data.title: Relaxed fun decent food[bar food] service is hit or miss, not always music. usually can have a good time
data.text: its all in title comfortable, casual, come as you are, ok pizza and sandwiches, somewhat family friendly, but I wol=uld rather you leave your kids at home, please

data.title: OK
data.text:
Not a place I would go for a real meal but ok for a time with friends.
Food is ok but not great and pricy.

data.title: Food is marginal
data.text: Have been to Eddie's a couple of times, and the food is "Marginal" at best.  It is not expensive, just could go to a fast food place and get the same or even better meals.

data.title: Cheap
data.text: Been here a few time support an acquaintance sing and play guitar here. Cheap food and cheep drinks. Nothing special. You get what you pay for.

data.title: Hood rat Central
data.text: You may not have to fight your way in the place, but you may have to fight on the way out. The main reason for this large amount of local drunken louts and hood rats who hang out in this "restaurant." I guess it qualifies as one; given the various health code violations, it seems obvious they serve bad food and food badly. As some of the others have opined, you are taking your life in your hands if you enter this dump; if the food doesn't kill you, the hood rats might. You can't say you haven't been warned. Btw, the two female posters who rave about the place are no doubt bartenders intent on keeping their jobs.

data.title: Great pizza!
data.text: One of the best pizzas I have had for a long time.  Came for a late night pizza - thin crust with sausage, mushroom, green pepper, and extra cheese - and was amazed.  Great craft beer on tap, friendly service, large screen TV's.  Highly recommended!

data.title: Eh! You can do better.
data.text: It's a strip mall stop and you'll have a strip mall experience.    The food is nothing to write home about and at times the patronage is frightening.

data.title: Yumm!
data.text:
Just love this place!!  Yes, it is not the Beachy bar or the Applebee's, but the food is WONDERFUL.  Plenty of food and count on get a box to take home the left overs.  Friday has a great DJ.  Smoking is NOT inside, which makes it a great great place!!!

They have started Karaoke.  They have their regulars, like any smaller bar, but a great young crowd on Friday nights!!

Try it out.

data.title: Buyer Beware..What a joke disgusting vomit hole
data.text:
Buyer Beware..What a joke disgusting vomit hole. I'm a spring breaker and have seen my share of bad places but this place is really bad. I was in my hotel room and was craving pizza and wanted to watch a basketball game so I Google pizzeria or sports bar in Largo and Eddie' popped up. I saw the photo of the place on Google and it looked nice. Well let me tell you that photo most of been taken 10 years ago because nothing looked the same, it was dirty disgusting crap hole the pizza tasted like frozen cardboard that you would find at a convenient stores freezer for allot less, the tap beer tasted watered down and no it was not Budweiser. I wont say the brand but it does not matter if there running a water line in there kegs. The blackjack tables were on top of old bar stools just balancing on top they were old and disgusting. It looked liked old vomit was stuck to the bar stools and if the main room looks like that I don't want to even think of what the kitchen looks like. I have seen neighborhood hole in the wall places but at least there clean and up to date this place should be shut down and closed. I took 1 bite complained that it was cold paid for my watered down beer and went to McDonald's. Wow..I never post complaints online but this was bad..Oh the cold cardboard pizza with 2 toppings was $33.00. Not a sports bar only had 2 small HD TVs 1 one large outdated rear projector TV showing ESPN. (THAT'S NOT A SPORTS BAR) Serving cold cardboard frozen pizza for $30 (THAT'S NOT A PIZZERIA) You should rename it Eddie's Vomit Hole.
CELI DONOFRIO Owner

data.title: Dregs of Largo
data.text: Yeah, normally full of drunken idiots or people who just got out of jail. Avoid at all costs, the food is horrendous and the crowd are a bunch of local hoodlums intent on intoxication. The owner is normally there stewed to the gills at all hours, good luck if you have a problem having a drunk sort it out.
